FuncDef: This command indirectly configures the rate used by Access-Network-Location (ANL) policers. Because ANL total bandwidth is dynamically measured and estimated by AA, this command allows the operator to configure the ratio of that measured bandwidth to be used by the ANL policer as the policer rate.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies an integer value that specifies a percentage that is applied against the ANL estimate maximum bandwidth to produce the actual rate that is used by the policer when ANL congestion occurs. Values-0 to 200 (0: means drop all traffic). ParamDefault: Default- 0
